sense.def:
To tickle someone
pomeni s prsti se nalahko dotikati nekoga, pogosto zato, da se začne smejati.

seg.quote: Babies want to be tickled and hugged.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
tickles
, povzroča dražeč občutek, ker se nalahno dotika dela našega telesa.

seg.quote: He flicked away a strand of hair that was tickling Ellen's nose.

sense.def:
Kadar dejstvo ali položaj
tickles someone
, človeka zabava ali mu dobro dene.
